title: National Taiwan University Food Court
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Buffet, Fast food, Take-out, Taiwanese
description: Buffet-style food stall in one of the National Taiwan University food courts. Open to the public. You pay into the basket on the right, then select rice or noodles and 3 dishes from the buffet. Staff speaks a little English. Hard to find but look out for a big "vegetarian" written among pictures on the wall.
